Title: After the Thin Man
Writer: Frances Goodrich (screen play), Albert Hackett (screen play), Dashiell Hammett (from the story by)
Actors: William Powell, Myrna Loy, James Stewart, Elissa Landi
Plot: Now back in San Francisco after their holiday in New York, Nick and Nora find themselves trying to solve another mystery. It's New Year's Eve and they are summoned to dinner at Nora's elderly, and very aristocratic, family. There they find that cousin Selma's husband Robert has been missing for three days. Nick reluctantly agrees to look for him but the case takes a twist when Robert is shot and Selma is accused of murder. Several other murders occur but eventually Nick gathers everyone into the same room to reveal the identity of the killer.
